content: Decide whether the two line items you are given are referencing the same data and return it in a format like {{Sentence 1 Line Item Names, Q1 2023, Data}, {New Line Item Names, Q2 2023, Data}}
Thanks, Once I have finished comparing these two line items I will return a message in the format: {{Sentence 1 Line Item Names, Quarter year, Data}, {New Line Item Names, Quarter year, Data}}
